record.description: University of Chicago Track Team, Intercollegiate Indoor and Outdoor Champions, 1917: fourth row: G. Van Kirk, C. Greene, C. G. Higgins, A. A. Stagg (coach), W. C. Gorgas, P. Grossman, and H. H. McCosh; third row: N. B. Johnson, F. L. Brinkman, B. Dismond, H. R. Clark, E. C. Curtiss, D. M. Swett, and T. Eck; second row: C. M. Bent, F. Firestone, D. J. Fisher (captain), G. I. Tenney, and C. T. Brelos; first row: A. R. Jones, P. W. Graham, G. L. Otis, and D. R. Powers.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
